about.title: About Me
content: I'm a web developer with over 5 years of experience creating digital solutions that matter. My passion lies in crafting clean, efficient code and intuitive user experiences.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge through writing and speaking.
I believe in the power of simple, well-executed ideas and the importance of continuous learning in our ever-evolving field.
